website_summaries.verdict: The Dell Precision 15 5000 Series is an impressive mobile workstation featuring  premium build quality, a stellar 4K touch display, and top-notch performance.
pros: Slim, sturdy design built with premium materials
Brilliant 4K touch display with stunning sharpness and colors

customer_reviews.title: Nice little laptop
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. Sturdy, enough power to run everything you like, I've got Arch Linux installed on it and it works a charm (albeit with some synclient customisation but that's a requirement everywhere). It's not for gaming even though it will play Dota 2, just, at an abominable framerate and it can struggle with some tankier programs like Atom editor but for a sysadmin it's perfect. Quite light and the keys are nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Trail

customer_reviews.title: Had it for one month but very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for one month but so far so (very) good. Key strengths: graphics is very good indeed; key weaknesses: some keys seem to be a bit small. it may take a while getting used to. Happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspired
customer_reviews.text: Fires up very quickly does what it says in the spec. Only down side is Microsoft who constantly interrupt with offers of software I don't need and who will not let you load existing software because its not the latest.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John Crowland

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Frankly the worse experience I’ve ever had. I plugged it in and and it then spent the next 8 and a half hours updating windows 10 and other features. The computer took a long time to startup and was slow on the internet. It also froze a number of times while just trying to recover emails. After 10 hours I put it back in the box and sent it back. Very disappointing experience. I only purchased as my old pc of 10 Years was on its way out. To be honest it works better than this one did. I won’t be purchasing another Dell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this laptop if it costs more than £200
customer_reviews.text: This product is over priced ships with unknown damages and is quite slow this machine is not recommended at this price the amd graphics are not useable or if they are they are worse than the intel HD this laptop should sell for around £200 when it does it’s some what of a decent product
customer_reviews.author: Euan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues to say about and fits well into its carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description on reconditioned computer
customer_reviews.text: Bought as reconditioned. Was only a small amount of list price and minor cosmetic damage. In reality graphics card was not working. Good service from the Amazon support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister and she is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Innecco

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy DELL
customer_reviews.text: brand new DELL laptop is broken. Won't switch on at all. Tried everything, looked for help on-line, called DELL, but laptop seems to have a faulty screen. Absolutely furious. Looking at on-line reviews this seems to be a common problem for DELL !!! Not only that, but the packaging used from this company was a disgrace. Bashed and torn box, inferior taping. Used a box which didn't fit and tried to tape it, but it didn't work. Total disgrace
customer_reviews.author: amac

customer_reviews.title: I hate this computer
customer_reviews.text: I hate this computer. The worst thing I have ever spent my money, I regret this purchase EVERY single day. I have never used Dell or the New Windows 10 is it a combination that makes this laptop to bad? I dont know but I want to trade mine in.
customer_reviews.author: heather jones

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: For me this is the best purchase I made, It's brilliant and I am very happy with my laptop
customer_reviews.author: Paracha

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 15 5000 Series 15.6 inch Laptop (Intel Core i5, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 4 GB AMD Graphics, 1080p Full HD, Anti-Glare) - Silver
product_meta.description:
Dell Inspiron 15 5000 Series 15.6 inch Laptop (Intel Core i5, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 4 GB AMD Graphics, 1080p Full HD, Anti-Glare) - Silver.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Dell Laptop
User Documentation
Power and Connection Cables
feature_bullets: Power player: Web pages, games and apps fire up fast with 6th Gen Intel Core processors
Enhanced battery life up to 7 hours, means you can go longer in between charges
With TrueColour you can adjust colour saturation to your personal preference, from rich and vibrant to more muted, tailor your display's colour temperature and tone to suit your needs
Built-in entertainment allows you to watch DVDs, burn CDs or load software and applications quickly onto your desktop with an internal optical disc drive
Effortless productivity: Zoom, point and scroll through content quickly with the large precision touchpad
